snippet: Irwin Winkler, the "De-Lovely" director and producer of "Rocky," "Raging Bull" and "Goodfellas," will be president of the Tribeca Film Festival, sitting atop a roster of jurors that includes Academy Award winners, up-and-comers and the guy who...
abstract: Irwin Winkler, the "De-Lovely" director and producer of "Rocky," "Raging Bull" and "Goodfellas," will be president of the Tribeca Film Festival, sitting atop a roster of jurors that includes Academy Award winners, up-and-comers and the guy who manages Justin Bieber.

headline.main: Tribeca Film Festival Announces an Eclectic Lineup of Juries
